page.title: 16FASHION (2)
page.content:
At the moment,people wear famous brands of clothes like Pringle,Nike, Le Coste,Le shark,Addidas,Puma and Slazanger.These are very expensive,for instance a plain Pringle jumper (lambswool)will cost around Â£20. Fashions change according to the weather,and clothing on the continent, but most people wear what they like to wear,and what is comfortable.A craze from the continent at the moment is florescent socks!Yes,florescent!A little later people started to wear odd socks,and these were worn especially in 1984.Most of our fashions come from America,but this is not always so.
By Gary Christer.
